Title: Requires train operators to completely stop trains prior to entering stations located within N.Y. city
Summary: Requires train operators to completely stop trains prior to entering stations located within a city of over one million inhabitants.
LawCode: Add ยง56-a, Rail L; amd ยง406, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the railroad law and the transportation law, in relation to requiring train operators to completely stop trains prior to entering stations located within a city of over one million inhabitants
